title: History of DCE Darbhanga
content:
Darbhanga College of Engineering (DCE), Darbhanga is a government engineering college in Darbhanga, Bihar, India. It was established in 2008.

It is affiliated with Bihar Engineering University, Patna and approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi.

The college was inaugurated by the Honorable Chief Minister of Bihar, Shri Nitish Kumar.

title: Principal's Message
content:
Dear Students and Parents,

It is my privilege to welcome you to DCE Darbhanga. our institution is dedicated to providing high-quality technical education...

We focus on holistic development...

Dr. Vikash Kumar
Principal

title: Vision & Mission
content:
Vision

To produce competent, innovative, and ethical engineers...

Mission

  • To provide state-of-the-art infrastructure.
  • To promote research and development.
  • To foster industry-institute interaction.
